column3: News;The Hong Kong-based English language ------South China Morning Post------ on Wednesday reported that Yingluck used a Cambodian passport to register as the director of PT Corporation Co in August 24
column5: almost a year after she fled prosecution in Thailand.------Media reports say that four months later Yingluck became the chairwoman of Shantou International Container Terminal (SICT)
column6: a port operator based in China’s Guangdong province.------The Post’s enquiries to SICT went unanswered. ------http://www.nationmultimedia.com/detail/breakingnews/30362015
